joy: The only thing that will make you happy is being happy with who you are.
There are so many beautiful reasons to be happy.
Whoever is happy will make others happy.
sad: A negative mind will never give you a positive life, Smile!.
Be strong because things will get better. It maybe stormy now, but it never rains forever, Smile!.
You are enough, just us you are. Smile!.
Don’t let yesterday take up too much of today.
fear: If you want to conquer fear, don’t sit home and think about it. Go out and get busy.
The fears we don’t face becomes are limits.
Fear are nothing more than the state of mind.
Never let your fear decide your future.
disgust: Use your imagination in a healthy way.
People can overcome disgust by individuating the other, thinking about their mind, needs, and preferences.
Disgust toward social outcasts avoids perceived moral and infectious contamination.
No matter how badly someone treats you, never drop down to their level. Remain calm, stay strong, and walk away.
angry: Anger doesn’t solve anything it builds nothing, but it can destroy everything.
Just because you’re angry, doesn’t mean you have the right to be cruel.
Try to manage your anger since people can’t manage their stupidity.
For every minute you remain angry, you give up sixty seconds of peace of mind.
